decode_click <- function(click) {
  operator <- str_extract(click, "^[LR]") |> 
    case_match("L" ~ "-",
               "R" ~ "+")
  digits <- str_extract(click, "\\d+") |> as.integer()
  list(op = operator,
       dg = digits)
}

dial <- function(digit) {
  #if (digit < 0)  return((digit %% 99) + 1)
  #if (digit > 99) return( (digit %% 99) - 1)
  while (digit < 0) {
    digit <- digit + 100
  }
  while (digit > 99) {
    digit <- digit - 100
  }
  digit
}

start <- 50

}
